meta.article_title: February 18, 2019 - Judging the Depth of a Serve

judging-the-depth-of-a-serve.probleme: Judging the depth of a serve

debutant.solution: Watch the ball as it rises and learn to judge its trajectory with experience

intermediaire.probleme: Judge the spin, speed, and bounce of a serve
intermediaire.solution: Observe the paddle and racket movement, and consider the ball's speed, downward travel, and spin

intermediaire.probleme: Practice judging depth reflexively as the ball is leaving the paddle or sooner
intermediaire.solution: Practice with a coach or partner to develop this skill

exercices_complementaires.description: Have a coach or partner serve deep balls, and practice judging their depth quickly

metriques_progression: Practice regularly to develop the skill

erreurs_a_eviter.solution: Practice recognizing long serves and judging their trajectory with experience
